title: RPCs used by CVIX
cvixNotes: No security keys associated with CVIX and CVIX only writes directly to VistA (mainly 2006.95) if there is no VIX on site.
rpcNotes: Note PHOTOS, FIND, INFO for PAT - see impls as key part of patient record. Note the 'raw' RPCs like MAGG SYS GLOBAL NODE to get 2005 global node and 'MAGG WRKS UPDATES' which starts a new session and 'MAGGACTION LOG' which updates log 2006.95 (so honor system!). 'MAGGUSER2' returns user info.
magRPCs: MAG NEW SOP INSTANCE UID RPC
